channel.title: Networking on Cupper
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Cupper

item.title: Setting up EIGRP Lab
item.description: In this lab we will setup EIGRP. EIGRP is a routing protocol used on Cisco routers This lab can be done on Packet Tracer, GNS3, CML, etc For info on how to run this lab visit “Running Labs” under “Show more” at the top of our website We will start with a topology of 3 routers, any Cisco IOS router will work for this. Our topology looks like this as a base:
